First, tune everybody to zero db with a test signal of 200 Hz sine at “107” gain (-12 db)


Outer loop is each instrument’s volume
first zero db
next “louder”
next “quieter”


Middle loop is three signals:
pink noise
sine 200 Hz
sine 1k


Inner loop is three gains for the test signal
maximum = 127
107
87
